There are so many things you could use duct tape for and a hammock is NOT one of them. You could use the duct tape to make watertight containers for drinking water. You can use it as tape and use it to make a shelter. You could use it to repair a net or tarp that would keep you dry or catch food. You could roll it into a rope and make snares for animals.
